Text.p: Developed initially as a submarine flying-boat, Marine Trench Co. soon saw the possibilities for extending their operations into space and the Moray SFB became the 'Star Boat' after its ingenious adaptations were completed. Aquatic space-faring races are the main users of this multi-purpose vessel, whose hull is able to withstand the pressures of depths of up to 5500 fathoms. Standard fittings include: high-power seal locks, 2 torpedo tube/single missile pods and flood-lock cabins for subaquatic life-forms.
